title: how do I get in touch with Joan Leotta.  I would like to ask her a question regarding the Italian festival
text:
We can't give out personal phone numbers but we can direct you to
reaching her via Facebook, Linkin or other searches, such as
whitepages.com.



http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&source=hp&fkt=703&fsdt=2313&q=Joan+Leotta&btnG=Google+Search&aq=f&oq=&aqi=
